summary:
I am a senior software engineer with a wide range of experience coding across the tech stack. I started my career as a full-stack engineer splitting time between the front and backend before transitioning solely to the backend/infrastructure side of things. My passion for continuous learning, people, and solving complex problems naturally led me towards the leadership path in software but I have always been a leader amongst my peers with or without a title.
In my free time, I love playing basketball (big Lakers fan!), surfing, hiking, and just generally being outside. I believe you should pay it forward whenever given the opportunity and that ice cream is always an appropriate meal.
headline: CEO @ Brightband

experience.description: Brightband revolutionizes executive recruitment by using AI to match companies and talent in a dynamic marketplace based on word of mouth recommendations.
experience.title: Cofounder & CEO

experience.description:
I've mentored over 20 individuals with durations ranging from 1 month to almost 1 year. I have helped a variety of people including self-taught/boot camp graduates looking to land their first jobs, career changers, people looking to level up from mid to senior roles, and new managers. I spend time getting to know the individual before carefully crafting a mentorship plan with regular one-on-one meetings to help reach your goal.

https://mentorcruise.com/mentor/donovanlowkeen/
experience.title: Mentor

experience.description: Investing in early-stage companies via Hustle Fund's Angel Squad.
experience.title: Angel Squad Member

experience.description:
- Managed/mentored a team of 6 engineers to migrate a 20 year old legacy system to a modern agile tech stack featuring event driven microservices and REST APIs in Golang in less than 3.5 months					
- Empowered engineers to own the full software development life cycle through testing, monitoring, and automating CI/CD pipelines with Harness, Kubernetes, Helm, and Terraform
- Championed a culture change from synchronous group consensus decisions, short-sighted patchwork, and no recognition to async subject-matter-expert led discussions, building scalable software solutions, and frequent recognition and appreciation
- Collaborate with a plethora of internal/external teams across a global workforce to clearly set expectations and deliver products on time
experience.title: Software Engineering Manager

experience.description:
- Lead design and implementation of horizontal pod autoscaling and large pod rescheduling					
- Responsible for planning, organizing, and completing the migration of all k8s clusters, deployment pipelines, and testing environments in the entire company from helm v2 to v3					
- Led migration to Spinnaker to improve release cadence from monthly to daily deployments					
- Serve as K8 & Helm subject matter expert assisting teams migrating from VM to K8s
- Build and maintain new and existing features for our internal deployment tool using Python, Golang, Helm, and Kubernetes
experience.title: Senior Software Engineer

projects.description: ARgo is a mobile application that uses location intelligence and augmented reality to immerse users in a new experience. Users have the ability to enter into new worlds through AR portals and collect badges with their friends.
